p: We used ArcGIS 10.0 [ 29] to generate five non-climate variables from 90 m resolution NASA Shuttle Radar Topographic Mission (SRTM) elevation data processed by CGIAR-CSI [ 30]. The variables produced were selected to represent resource availability and topographical features that may help define a given speciesâ€™ ecological niche. Table 3 summarises the non-climate variables considered for inclusion in each distribution model. Elevation itself was not used as it was strongly correlated with the bioclimatic variables.
